name: Iced Matcha Latte
description: This Iced Matcha Latte is a creamy and refreshing beverage, perfect for a morning or afternoon pick me up
directions: Place Matcha Powder in small bowl
Add Hot Water and whisk until smooth with no lumps remaining
Pour Matcha and Water mixture into glass
Whisk Heavy Cream until frothy and desired thickness
Place whisked Heavy Cream on top
Enjoy with whisked Heavy Cream mixed into drink or sitting on top
